scenes.background: You decided to handle the task yourself. [Bob] looks concerned, while [Monica] continues typing.
scenes.description: 'Are you sure you want to take it all on? It looks overwhelming.' He sighs, leaning back in his chair.

options.text: I've got it under control, Bob. Don't worry.
options.analysis: You show confidence and self-regulation, but may lack empathy by not addressing Bob's concerns.

options.text: Honestly, it is a lot, but I think I can manage.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the workload, showing high empathy and emotional perception, but it may affect your self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: It's challenging, but I prefer handling it myself to avoid delays.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation and social skills by preferring to handle the task, but emotional perception could be improved.
